extendedIngredients.name: dill pickle chips
extendedIngredients.originalString: 6 to 8 crinkle-cut kosher dill pickle chips, such as Country Fair

extendedIngredients.name: hamburger bun
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 4-inch seeded hamburger bun, such as a King's Hawaiian sandwich bun if you want to spoil yourself!!!!
metaInformation: such as a king's hawaiian sandwich bun if you want to spoil yourself!!!!

extendedIngredients.name: pastrami
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 ounces thinly sliced pastrami, such as Kruse Navel

recipes.title: Guido Burger

winePairing.pairingText: Malbec, Merlot, and Zinfandel are my top picks for Burger. Merlot will be perfectly adequate for a classic burger with standard toppings. Bolder toppings call for bolder wines, such as a malbec or peppery zinfandel. You could try Gascon Malbec. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 13 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Gascon Malbec
productMatches.description: A classic expression of the grape, our Don Miguel Gasc√≥n Malbec opens with intense aromas of blackberry, plum and a hint of mocha. On the palate, dark fruit flavors are finely intertwined with notes of spice, licorice and chocolate for a magnificent full-bodied Malbec. Round tannins and a plush mouthfeel lead the way to a long, velvety finish.

recipes.instructions: Heat a flat griddle to medium-high.                          Put the bun on the griddle to toast it. Then place the hamburger patty on the griddle and sprinkle with seasoning salt. When the bun is toasted, remove it from the griddle and set it in your prep area. Put the ketchup on the bottom part of the bun, then the pickles. Make sure to spread them out so that every flavor is in every bite.                          Place the pastrami on the griddle and sear away. Flip the hamburger patty, sprinkle with seasoning salt and cook to desired doneness. Place the Swiss cheese on top and melt. Add the pastrami on top of the cheese. Top the pastrami with the grilled onions.                          Now all you have left is the top part of the bun and the brown mustard. Squirt or spread the brown mustard on the bun top and place it on the grilled onions. Transfer the hamburger patty and toppings to the bottom part of the bun. Enjoy.

steps.step: Heat a flat griddle to medium-high.

Put the bun on the griddle to toast it. Then place the hamburger patty on the griddle and sprinkle with seasoning salt. When the bun is toasted, remove it from the griddle and set it in your prep area.
Put the ketchup on the bottom part of the bun, then the pickles. Make sure to spread them out so that every flavor is in every bite.
Place the pastrami on the griddle and sear away. Flip the hamburger patty, sprinkle with seasoning salt and cook to desired doneness.
Place the Swiss cheese on top and melt.
Add the pastrami on top of the cheese. Top the pastrami with the grilled onions.
Now all you have left is the top part of the bun and the brown mustard. Squirt or spread the brown mustard on the bun top and place it on the grilled onions.
Transfer the hamburger patty and toppings to the bottom part of the bun. Enjoy.
